explanation: [0-0] In front of a garage, two men are sitting on chairs, facing forward. The man on the left is wearing a dark gray short-sleeved shirt, his right hand clenched into a fist in front of him. The man on the right is wearing a light gray short-sleeved shirt. Below them is an upside-down bicycle wheel with a Coke bottle fixed to its edge by a device. There are some green leaves in the upper left corner. Above is a black English caption on a white background: "Most Unlikely Trick Shots".

[0-3] First, the bicycle wheel spins continuously. The man in the dark gray short-sleeved shirt throws a white object into the Coke bottle with his right hand. The two men open their mouths wide and jump up at the same time as the coke in the bottle gushes out.

[0-3] First, the bicycle wheel spins continuously. The man in the dark gray short-sleeved shirt throws a white object into the Coke bottle with his right hand. The two men open their mouths wide and jump up at the same time as the coke in the bottle gushes out.

[0-3] First, the bicycle wheel spins continuously. The man in the dark gray short-sleeved shirt throws a white object into the Coke bottle with his right hand. The two men open their mouths wide and jump up at the same time as the coke in the bottle gushes out.

[3-9] Then the scene switches to a room indoors. Two men are sitting on a gray sofa with two closed white double doors behind them. The man on the left is wearing a gray short-sleeved shirt, and the man on the right is wearing a black short-sleeved shirt. They each hold a bamboo skewer in their hands, a wine bottle in front of them, and several skewers scattered on the floor. The man in the gray short-sleeved shirt throws a skewer with his right hand. The skewer enters the mouth of the bottle. The man in the gray short-sleeved shirt opens his mouth wide and jumps up, releasing the skewers in his hand. The man in the black short-sleeved shirt opens his mouth wide and leans back against the back of the sofa. The scene changes to a man in a blue short-sleeved shirt standing on a ladder with his head down, with many colored papers scattered on the floor. A paper shredder is placed under the ladder. A man in a white short-sleeved shirt sits on the sofa, looking at the man in the blue short-sleeved shirt on the ladder. Two decorative paintings are hung on the wall behind him to the right. The man in the blue short-sleeved shirt takes out a green paper with his right hand and throws it to the ground. The green paper enters the shredder. The man in the blue short-sleeved shirt jumps off the ladder and jumps up and down on the ground with his mouth wide open. The man in the white short-sleeved shirt stands up from the sofa and jumps up and down with his mouth wide open.
